titles.title: Veterans Readiness and Employment Improvement Act of 2025
Modernizing the Veterans On-Campus Experience Act of 2025
Veterans Readiness and Employment Improvement Act of 2025
To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain improvements to the provision of on-campus educational and vocational counseling by the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 119-228.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 186.

action.text: Mr. Bost moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 980.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 402 - 2 (Roll no. 49).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
